title: Tupigrafia
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Publications](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Publications) : Tupigrafia**

**Publishers:** [Claudio Rocha](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Claudio%20Rocha) (BRA), [Tony de Marco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tony%20de%20Marco) (BRA)  
**Editors:** [Claudio Rocha](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Claudio%20Rocha), [Tony de Marco](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tony%20de%20Marco)  
**Language:** Brazilian Portuguese (English translation addendum)

A small format Brazilian typographic magazine packed full of great visual content.

**Website:** [www.tupigrafia.com.br](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015024113/http:/www.tupigrafia.com.br/)
author: Conor
